innhold.avsnitt: Your pregnancy allowance will be calculated on the basis of the average of the income that you have had in the last 3 calendar months before the start of your pregnancy allowance period.
If the difference between your annual income and your income in the past 3 months is greater than 25 per cent, we must assess which income is most representative in your situation.

liste.punkt: If you have been working for such a short period that no freelance income has been reported to the a-ordningen for 3 full months, the income for this shorter period of time will be used in the calculations.
